>Construction of pCSC3
//Synthetic sucrose promoter driving amilGFP, variant with exact repressor region of P_cscA
acquire oligo csc7
acquire oligo csc8
acquire plasmid p20N31
PCR csc7,csc8 on p20N31	(2952bp, fcsc3)
Assemble fcsc3	(BsmBI, pCSC3)
Transform pCSC3	(Mach1, Kan)
---
>csc7
ccataCGTCTCacaccaGGATCCaaataggagaaatac
>csc8
cagtcCGTCTCtggtgaattgttaacctagcataatacctaggactg
>p20N31
